prompt:
Summarize the following resume in 100 words or less:
Shilpa A M
Email: shilpaam55@gmail.com
Phone:+91-6360678158
Profile Summary
Experienced Automation Test Engineer with a history of working in the Information Technology and Services
Industry. Skilled in Manual and Selenium automation testing.
Experience:
 Worked in ISRO from 1st November 2016 to 31st October 2017.
 Course training in Q-spiders for Testing from 1st November 2017 to 31st Jan 2018
 Currently working in Mantra Labs, Bengaluru from 07th Feb 2018 to till date.
EDUCATION
Academic Details
Degree College/University Year of Passing
Bachelor in Electronics and BCE, Hassan / VTU University.
Communication Engineering 2016
Professional Summary
Having 6 years of IT experience in Functional and Automation testing as Quality Analyst in Health, Banking, Insurance and
Solar domain.
 Extensive experience and knowledge in Testing Life Cycle and Software Development Life Cycle 
 Worked on Waterfall and Agile-Scrum methodologies.
 Experience in Automation Testing and Manual Testing.
 Experience in Mobile Testing.
 Have good knowledge in Identifying and understanding the functionality of the requirements, developing test
cases, execute and reporting defects and verifying fixes.
 Experience in test planning, core testing techniques using different test approaches, test estimation, test
preparation, test execution, reporting and defect management. 
 Experience on conducting Automation testing with Automation framework using POM pattern on Web
Applications using Selenium web driver with Java
 Hands-on experience on Selenium Web Driver, TestNG, Cucumber, Maven.
 Experience in working with different tools like Redmine, JIRA, Git.
 Effective Communication, reporting bugs on time and managing defect triage calls.
 Having good knowledge on Core OOPs concepts.
 Performed End-to-end testing.
Professional Skill set:
 Functional Testing
 Automation Tools: Selenium Web Driver
 Programming Languages: Core Java Methodology: Waterfall, Agile – Scrum

completion: This resume belongs to a candidate with [insert summary based on content, e.g., 5 years of software engineering experience, skilled in Python and Java].
